title: Algorithmic Trading and Market Makers
description: Understanding how algorithms and market makers move price. Learn the psychology of money and how institutions build positions.
content:
In this course, you will explore:

• How HFT (High Frequency Trading) impacts markets
• Understanding order flow and smart money
• Building positions like an institution
• The psychology behind price movements
• Advanced confluence strategies

quiz.question: What is order flow in trading?
options: The speed at which orders are placed
The sequence and volume of buy and sell orders
The flow of information to traders
quiz.explanation: Order flow refers to the sequence and volume of buy and sell orders in the market. Understanding order flow helps traders anticipate price movements.
